participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Introverted and contemplative, struggling with self-esteem issues but has a kind heart.
participant_1.background: i am overweight and unhappy. i do not believe in god. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. i work at a nursing home. my wife left me and took my children.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and carefree, enjoys socializing but finds it hard to commit to relationships.
participant_2.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i work from home. i watch too much tv in spare time. i have never had a steady relationship.
